thread.title: BRIEF-Chuying Agro-Pastoral Group Expects 2017 Net Profit To Fall 24.1-27.5 Pct Y/Y

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Chuying Agro-Pastoral Group Expects 2017 Net Profit To Fall 24.1-27.5 Pct Y/Y

organizations.name: reuters) - chuying agro-pastoral group co ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Chuying Agro-Pastoral Group Co Ltd :
* SAYS IT EXPECTS 2017 NET PROFIT TO FALL 24.1-27.5 PERCENT Y/Y FROM 869.1 MILLION YUAN ($137.40 million) YEAR AGO Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FutlLY Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3251 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
